Users who are skilled and well versed with website use may find a more unique, yet less intuitive or less\u00a0<\/span><a href=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/Usability\" title=\"Usability\" data-cms-link=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/Usability\" data-cms-link-type=\"external\">user-friendly<\/a><span>\u00a0website interface useful nonetheless. However, users with less experience are less likely to see the advantages or usefulness of a less intuitive website interface.
